{{ja-kanjitab|ばく|やく|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From ''baku'' ([[爆]], [[explode]], [[detonate]], [[burst]]) + ''yaku'' ([[薬]], [[chemical]], [[compound]])

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|ばくやく|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ばくやく}}

# [[explosive]], explosive [[compound]], [[blasting]] powder
